mapper.select: select invite_code , partner_code , auth_code , invite_status , invite_receiver , invite_sender from partner_invite where invite_code = #{inviteCode} and invite_receiver = #{userId} order by create_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into partner_notification (partner_code, notification_phone, create_user_id) values
(#{partnerCode}, #{notificationPhone}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select pr.partner_status , pr.reject_comment , pr.create_date from partner_reject pr where pr.partner_code = #{partnerCode}

select p.partner_code , p.partner_name , p.thumbnail , p.partner_kind , p.business_classification_code , p.business_name , p.business_no , p.business_condition , p.business_type , p.rep_name , p.rep_phone , p.cs_phone , p.business_address , p.business_address_sub , p.business_address_zip_code , p.partner_status from partner p where p.partner_code = #{partnerCode}

select pc.partner_code , pc.contract_code , pc.contract_status , pc.contract_manager_name , pc.contract_manager_phone , pc.tax_bill_email , pc.bank_code , pc.account_no , pc.account_holder , pc.contract_day , pc.contract_start_day , pc.contract_end_day , pc.contract_file_no from partner_contract pc where pc.contract_code = #{contractCode}

select p.partner_code , p.partner_name , p.thumbnail , p.partner_status , p.partner_kind , p.business_classification_code , p.business_name , p.business_no , p.business_condition , p.business_type , p.rep_name , p.rep_phone , p.cs_phone , p.business_address , p.business_address_sub , p.business_address_zip_code from partner p inner join partner_contract pc on p.partner_code = pc.partner_code where p.partner_code = #{partnerCode}

select pc.partner_code , pc.contract_code , pc.contract_status , pc.contract_manager_name , pc.contract_manager_phone , pc.tax_bill_email , pc.bank_code , pc.account_no , pc.account_holder , pc.contract_day , pc.contract_start_day , pc.contract_end_day , pc.contract_file_no from partner_contract pc where pc.partner_code = #{partnerCode} and pc.contract_code = #{contractCode}

select partner_code , partner_status , partner_name , partner_kind , business_classification_code , business_name , business_no from partner where business_no = #{businessNo}
and business_classification_code = #{businessClassificationCode}

select up.partner_code , up.auth_code , p.partner_name , p.partner_kind , p.partner_status , (select contract_code from partner_contract where partner_code = up.partner_code order by create_date desc limit 1) as contract_code , (select contract_status from partner_contract where partner_code = up.partner_code order by create_date desc limit 1) as contract_status , '' as comment , '' as display_status_name , '' as auth_code_name from users_partner up inner join partner p on p.partner_code = up.partner_code where up.user_id = #{userId}
